thread.title: Photos: Priyanka Chopra Looks Like An Absolute Goddess As She Chills By The Beach
thread.title_full: Photos: Priyanka Chopra Looks Like An Absolute Goddess As She Chills By The Beach

author: Divya Rao
title: Photos: Priyanka Chopra Looks Like An Absolute Goddess As She Chills By The Beach
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 6 . 2017 
Priyanka Chopra is a workaholic. We all know that. The actress spends most of her time on flights shuttling between India and the U.S., and even her days off are not really her days off as she’s always reading scripts or prepping for something in the pipeline, as she has confessed to before. I still don’t understand how she does it, but I’ll leave this for another conversation. 
Naturally, PC was in dire need of a weekend getaway and that’s exactly what she did. She headed to the beach with her friends and shared some gorgeous photos. A photo posted by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 4, 2017 at 3:21pm PST A photo posted by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 5, 2017 at 3:50pm PST A photo posted by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 3, 2017 at 3:24pm PST 
Gorgeous!
